title: Dream House
description: Dream House, the riveting debut novel from Pushcart Prize-winning author Valerie Laken, tells the story of one troubled houseâ€”the site of a domestic drama that will forever change the lives of two families. Embracing volatile issues such as race, class, and gentrification, while seamlessly mixing genres as diverse as crime fiction, suspense, and home renovation.
author: Valerie Laken
